scripts.buildzip-macos: cd src && BUILD_DATE=`date "+%Y%m%d-%H%M%S"` && zip -rq ../build/market-api-$BUILD_DATE * && sed -i "" -e "s/CodeUri:.*/CodeUri: build\/market-api-$BUILD_DATE.zip/g" ../template-aws.yaml
scripts.buildzip-linux: cd src && BUILD_DATE=`date "+%Y%m%d-%H%M%S"` && zip -rq ../build/market-api-$BUILD_DATE * && sed -i "s/CodeUri:.*/CodeUri: build\/market-api-$BUILD_DATE.zip/g" ../template-aws.yaml
scripts.clean-prep: rm -rf node_modules/ src/node_modules/ && mkdir node_modules src/node_modules
scripts.install-dev: npm run clean-prep && npm install --python=python2.7 && npm run modules-lambda && cp -a node_modules/* src/node_modules/
scripts.install-prod: npm run clean-prep && npm install --python=python2.7 --only=production && npm run modules-lambda && cp -a node_modules/* src/node_modules/
scripts.test-linux: npm run modules-linux && mocha **/*.tests.js && npm run modules-lambda
scripts.test-macos: npm run modules-macos && mocha **/*.tests.js && npm run modules-lambda
